Soldier, wake – the day is peeping,
Sunlight crawls across your bed.
Gone the world of silent sleeping,
Time to lift your weary head.
Hear the morning’s quiet chorus,
Feel the weight of what’s to come.
Marching on, the earth before us,
As the distant bugles drum.
Rise, and let your spirit gather,
Courage from the breaking dawn.
Face the day, no matter whether
Hope is bright or nearly gone.
Soldier, wake – the light is growing,
Take your place and do your part.
With the morning’s promise glowing,
Find your purpose, steel your heart.

Soldier, wake – the day is starting,
